name: 尺子和橡皮
description:
This is an anti Utopian game. You play a network worker who is responsible for deleting the illegal comments in the news everyday.

While I was making this game, I had been thinking about how to express, but I did not give up the effort of the game, but unfortunately, the game was not at last able to make a state of satisfaction.

Almost all news and reviews in games come from life. Some are forgotten by us, others are happening.

The game contains a large number of text, and we must read these words to complete the game. If the players feel bad about this, please choose carefully, sorry.
